features: 8 QT SUPER LARGE CAPACITY: A Dream Large Air Fryer Can Realize the Wish That Held a Small Party at Home. This Air Fryer Has an Extra Large 8 Quart Nonstick Basket, Which Can Cook a 3lbs Whole Chicken, 18 Piece Chicken Wings, 4 Piece Steaks, 800g French Fries, 1700W Motor that Helps to Efficiently Cook Food and Easily Satisfies 1 to 8 People Great for a Big Family and Holding Parties.

OIL-FREE AND THE PERFECT CRISP: This Air Frier Cooker Combines 5 Circle Powerful Heating Tubes with 360° Hot Air Circulation Technology to Ensure All Meals Cooked Evenly. It Uses the Maillard Reaction Principle to Ensure the Crispness of French Fries and Juiciness of Meat, and the Oil is Reduced by 85%. Perfect Gifts for Family and Friends.

8 ONE TOUCH PRESETS: The High-definition Led Display on Air Frier Has 8 Preprogrammed Settings that can be Selected on the Touchscreen. Just One Push of a Button to Prepare the Favorite Dish. It Is Also Possible to Set the Temperature (180 to 400 ° F) and the Time (up to 30 Minutes) Manually. Cooking Has Never Been this Easy.

UPGRADE MATERIAL AND SIMPLICITY: Dishwasher Safe Basket, a High Quality PTFE Coating Nonstick Tray, Heat-resistant Handle, Quickly Clean Without Leaving Greasy, No Longer Afraid to Clean up the Kitchen. When the Cooking Time is Over and the Air Fyer Beeps, Means the Cooking Finish.

36 PAPER RECIPES: There Are 36 Delicious Recipes Included in the Cook Book for This Toaster Oven Air Fryer. Regardless of Kitchen Skills, Detailed Step by Step Recipes Make Cooking Easy. ETL is Listed for Safety, PFOA Free, and BPA Free. Pamper Friends, Family with Tasty and Healthy Treats!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Efficient Air Fryer Make Healthy Meals Easier Our air fryer uses high-speed air circulation technology to make delicious French fries with up to 85 percent less fat than traditional deep frying. The unique combination of quick circulation hot air and oven components allows consumers to fry almost all kinds of delicious food snacks and seafood quickly and easily. Because only use air to fry, it produces less smell and steam and is easy to clean in daily use and, both safe and economical.

Oil-free & Healthier The air fryer uses 85% less oil than traditional oil pans, and the same frying taste has fewer calories. Let's add a kitchen utensil to a healthy life. 8 Preset Cooking Options The multi-function cooking fryer has 8 preset menus for you to choose from, a one-touch button to select your favorite cooking presets, and set your own favorite time and temperature by adjusting the control knob. Easy to Clean + Dishwasher Safe The non-stick pan basket can be cleaned in the dishwasher, freeing your hands. Reminder: When cleaning the basket with non-stick coating, do not use any abrasive materials.

Blue Air Fryer 4.5qt White Air Fryer 8qt Capacity 4.5 Quart 8 Quart Product Dimensions 11.5"D x 9.8"W x 12.2"H 14.6"D x 11.5"W x 14.6"H Display/Controls Knob Control Digital Display Power 1400W 1700W Material Stainless Steel + ABS Stainless Steel + ABS Temperature Control 175-400°F 175-400°F Cooking Time Setting 0-30 mins 0-30 mins Preset Menus No 8 Presets Auto Shut-Off ✓ ✓ Dishwasher Safe ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to operate
reviews.reviewText: Love the new airfryer, love the color, easy to clean, sturdy, good size for 1-2 people. It is easy to use, I didn’t want a digital, just 2 nobs. One for the timer, the other for temperature. I usually airfry at 400° . Makes your chicken nice and crispy 30-35 min at 400°. Easy to clean up. This is my second airfryer, different brand had it for 5 years. This one cleans up nicer, I highly recommended it, also comes with a recipe booklet. Don’t hesitate to purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value- large size
reviews.reviewText: I love the look and size of this air fryer. It's also so easy to clean, which is huge for me. My old air crier was hard to clean. This one is a breeze to clean. Ad As far as cooking, it is excellent! Even and fast cook time. I highly recommend this air fryer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So easy, fast and makes everything taste crispy good!
reviews.reviewText: It's simple to use, plug and cook....comes with a great recipe book, made wings first thing, listed along with other popular foods, and fries. They were like eating them at a pub! Works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Luxurious Look but not practical.
reviews.reviewText: Reason for the purchase:- Ceramic coating- Decent CC capacity for baking 6-8 chicken drumstick- White color goes well with the kitchen counter spaceI did not use the air fryer. I had to return it because it was missing the additional cooking tray. Also, the outer surface is not smooth, and due to the white color, it can become dirty quickly.

reviews.reviewText: We are living this air fryer! It can stay plugged in, it’s easier to clean than the smaller size & that one is easy.
I love it it’s it’s on my kitchen counter. It looks amazing as money I ever spent.
Tengo poco más de un año con ella y la utilizamos mucho en casa porque hacemos dieta. A pesar de usarla a diario y en repetidas ocasiones, sigue funcionando perfecto.

reviews.reviewTitle: Didn’t work but owners gave full refund right away
reviews.reviewText: The product didn’t work but was refunded right away great customer service

Muy buena compra, me toco con descuento y realmente funciona excelente, práctica y con gran tamaño. Al principio tenia miedo porque no tenia ningun comentario, pero me arriesgue por el descuento y ha sido una muy buena compra.
